mapper.select: SELECT cv.value as pjid ,pj.name as pjname ,issues.id as issid ,issues.subject ,issues.status_id as statusid ,ist.name as statusname FROM projects pj INNER JOIN custom_values cv ON pj.id=cv.customized_id AND cv.custom_field_id=2 AND cv.`value`!='' INNER JOIN issues ON pj.id=issues.project_id AND issues.status_id in (${status}) INNER JOIN issue_statuses ist ON ist.id=issues.status_id INNER JOIN users ON issues.assigned_to_id=users.id AND users.login=#{loginid}
